Posts.Content: Last year - June 2006 my sister Kari was diagnosed with Carcinoid Cancer. I'm dedicated to raising the money that will be required to find a cure for Carcinoid, a goal that is within reach.  Donations through this website is simple, fast and totally secure. It is also the most efficient way to support my fundraising efforts.  http://www.firstgiving.com/joshhouston
Posts.Title: Raising money for cancer - Runing Marathon, please help!
